name: Grandma's Macaroni Shrimp Salad
author: jessnay
summary: This is a family favorite! Macaroni, shrimp, and veggies make up this delicious salad!
ingredients: ¾ cup mayonnaise (such as Best Foods®)
2 ribs celery, diced, or more to taste
4  radishes, sliced, or more to taste
3  green onions, chopped, or more to taste
1 teaspoon seasoned salt (such as Season-All®), or to taste
3  hard-boiled eggs, sliced, or more to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Drain and pour into a salad bowl
Add mayonnaise, cucumber, peas, celery, radishes, green onions, and seasoned salt to the macaroni; toss well
Garnish with hard-boiled eggs, avocado, and tomato
